ComicInfo.Summary:
Wildstorm Comics presents stories that filled in the gaps for Resident Evil 1 & 2.
It contains three stories all from different perspectives.
STARS Files - Wesker's report to Chief Irons on the Mansion Incident Who Are These Guys - Researchers Tale to Ada Dangerous Secrets - The STARS Team Debrief Raccoon CIty RIP - A prologue to RE2 featuring Ada & Leon.
ComicInfo.Title: Raccoon City -- R.I.P.; Dangerous Secrets; Who Are These Guys?; S.T.A.R.S. Files
ComicInfo.Inker: Jim Lee,John Tighe,Mark Irwin,Armando Durruthy,John Tighe,Mark Irwin,Armando Durruthy
